wax.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a solid substance made of fat or oil and used to make candles, polish etc
wax.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: a natural sticky substance in your ears
wax.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to rub a layer of wax into a floor, surface etc to protect it or make it shine
wax.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: when the moon waxes, it seems to get bigger each night
wax.translation[1].definitions[2].defini: if you wax your legs, arms etc, you remove the hair from them using wax
